name: shorts-deflector
description: Seamlessly play YouTube Shorts with the normal desktop interface.
author: Evan <attituding@outlook.com>

scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run tailwindcss && npm run typescript && npm run clone && npm run zip
scripts.clear:
(if exist dist rmdir dist /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\chromium\_locales rmdir src\vendors\chromium\_locales /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\chromium\assets rmdir src\vendors\chromium\assets /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\chromium\index.html del src\vendors\chromium\index.html /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\chromium
etRequestRule.json del src\vendors\chromium
etRequestRule.json /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\chromiumesources rmdir src\vendors\chromiumesources /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\chromium\scripts rmdir src\vendors\chromium\scripts /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\commonesources rmdir src\vendors\commonesources /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\common\scripts rmdir src\vendors\common\scripts /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors irefox\_locales rmdir src\vendors irefox\_locales /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors irefox\assets rmdir src\vendors irefox\assets /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors irefox\index.html del src\vendors irefox\index.html /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors irefox
etRequestRule.json del src\vendors irefox
etRequestRule.json /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors irefoxesources rmdir src\vendors irefoxesources /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors irefox\scripts rmdir src\vendors irefox\scripts /s /q)
scripts.zip: (if not exist dist mkdir dist) && cd src/vendors/chromium && 7z a -tzip ../../../dist/chromium.zip * && cd ../firefox && 7z a -tzip ../../../dist/firefox.zip *
